The name of the order provider that holds the cart detail

member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Modules.Ecommerce.Shipping.Carriers.Providers.UspsProvider
member.summary: This class is the USPS carrier implementation of . Note: This code is written against USPS version 4 (API=RateV4). This code will divide the total wieght of the shipment into multiple boxes based on the fixed maximum weight (defined as a constant below) and the default box sizes as defined in the Ecommerce configuration settings. The code does currently not support the concept of products that must be shipped individually in their own boxes. In addition to setting up the Shipping Carrier Provider in the administration backend, you must also define one or more Shipping Services in the backend as well. The complete set of USPS shipping service codes can be found in the USPS API documentation.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Modules.Ecommerce.Shipping.Carriers.Providers.UspsProvider.GetServiceRates(Telerik.Sitefinity.Ecommerce.Shipping.Model.IShippingRequest)
member.summary: Gets the service rates.
member.param: The shipping request data.
member.remarks: The instance of contains a list of shipping rates for the carrier and an error message if the carrier returns one. Only shipping services that are configured as IsActive=true are included in the list of shipping rates

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Ecommerce.Orders.Model.CartDetail.InventoryAmount
member.summary: Gets or sets the quantity of product remaining in stock This value is not persisted to the database. It should be set EVERY time a cart order record is read from database to the actual inventory amount available for the product associated with this detail record. This is done for you if you use the OrdersManager GetCartOrder or TryGetCartOrder methods, but otherwise you will need to do it yourself.

member.summary: Payment will be processed through a payment processor (e.g PayPal, Authorize.net)

member.summary: Payment will be processed offline (e.g. bank wire, cash)

member.name: F:Telerik.Sitefinity.Ecommerce.Orders.Model.PaymentMethodType.Offsite
member.summary: Payment will be processed offsite (i.e. by leaving the sitefinity site and redirecting to an offsite webpage processor such as PayPal Express or Google checkout)

member.name: F:Telerik.Sitefinity.Ecommerce.Orders.Model.PaymentType.Sale
member.summary: The card will be charged with the amount of the payment.

member.name: F:Telerik.Sitefinity.Ecommerce.Orders.Model.PaymentType.Authorize
member.summary: The card will be only authorized for the amount of the payment.

member.name: F:Telerik.Sitefinity.Ecommerce.Orders.Model.PaymentType.AuthorizeAndCapture
member.summary: The card will be authorized for the amount of the payment and that amount will be captured / blocked, but not charged.
